attributes.action: Stop the compound proposed at Jct17 M25
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As part of the M25 widening SkanskaBalfourBeatty have sought to site a works compound,including concrete batching plant on GreenBelt land directly in front off residential housing. http://www.threerivers.gov.uk/Default.aspx/Web/M25wideningtemporarycompoundatJunction17Jan09 
The local people have established an action group email; stopthecompound@yahoo.co.uk to press for the proposed site to be relocated somewhere more suitable.We object to the site proposed at Long Lane amongst other reasons;to the loss of residential amenity•loss of farmland of one of the few remaining farms in the district•to the inevitable detrimental impact on wildlife•possible land contamination•impact on the highway network•procedure adopted in by-passing the normal planning process•danger and health risk siting an industrial concrete batching plant so close to housing
Please join us in showing support and public weight to see these proposed sight plans quashed and the compound moved to a more suitable site
